about_the_game:
The Infirmity: Main Story

The story begins with the successful scientist Dr. Kylie discovering a revolutionary technology called GMET (Genetic Modeling and Editing Technology). This technology allows for easy modifications of the genetic map in DNA, making it possible to produce more efficient animals and treat certain diseases. Upon its introduction, GMET garnered significant interest and attracted substantial investments, leading to the establishment of the GMET Center and the swift commencement of experiments.

After achieving success with other organisms, GMET's next target was the Bombyx Mori moth. However, things did not go as planned; serious problems began to arise, spiraling out of control. This danger now threatens not just GMET, but all of humanity.

Gameplay

In the game, you will use various weapons to eliminate zombies, survive waves of undead, and overcome a series of obstacles to complete your missions. Combine strategy and reflexes to join the fight for survival !

short_description: The Infirmity: Amidst a zombie virus outbreak, Max fights to save a computer containing valuable data on the brink of apocalypse. As he overcomes challenging obstacles, he faces dangerous enemies and battles for the future of humanity.
